title: Hanging, 1920–1930
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic trim
Technique: surface resist
description: Resist-dyed silk with metallic trim. Central motif of Queen Esther(?), lower left has a seven-branch candlestick, and lower right has a single candle; upper right and right side has a running animal. Border contains various religious motifs including a chalice, vase, crown, etc. Colors are bright orange, yellow, green, red, and brown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, 1920–1930.Medium: silk, metallic trim
Technique: surface resist. 1970-43-1.
